description: Discover the best hotels in Pangakalan Bun, Indonesia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Modern Central Borneo City Stay with Restaurant & Terrace Pool Bar
hotels.description: Stay in the heart of the Pangkalan Bun's thriving commercial district at this chic Central Borneo stay. Your hotel is just a short journey from the world-renowned Tanjung Puting National Park, home to the largest orangutan population in the world. Savour international cuisine at the onsite restaurant, relax with a cocktail by the pool or explore the city's rich Dayak culture and traditional floating markets. The hotel is only a 15-minute drive from Iskandar Airport, making it an ideal base for your Borneo adventure.

seo.title: Hotels in Pangakalan Bun - Indonesia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Pangakalan Bun, Indonesia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
